text: Codrongianos (Codronzànu, Codronzànos) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,309 people lived there. Its area is 30.39 km². It is 317 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Codrongianos
